title: Configuration of a Mobile Gateway pipeline

name.description: name of the pipeline, must be set to mgw for the MGW pipeline.

nhop.description: number of next-hops in the L3 table towards the public Internet

fakedrop.description: whether to actually drop unmatched packets (False) or send them immediately to the output port (True) for correct rate measurements

fluct-user.description: number of user arrival/departure events per sec

handover.description: number of handover events per sec

fluct-server.description: number of server update events per sec

downlink-default-gw-ip.description: Default gateway IP address, downlink direction

downlink-default-gw-mac.description: Default gateway MAC address, downlink direction
